MetaInfo.Title: Social media sharing with the Shariff element in OpenCms
MetaInfo.Description: The Shariff social media element integrated in the OpenCms Mercury template, enables website users to share their favorite content without compromising their privacy. If this used on a detail page, all the information to share will be read from the detail content. If this is used on a manually edited page, you should also add a Meta info element to control what is actually shared.
